alert.note: Alert for Haskell; McIntosh; Muskogee; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 7:13PM CDT until October 15 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Haskell County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northeastern McIntosh County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Sequoyah County in east central Oklahoma... Southeastern Muskogee County in east central Oklahoma... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 713 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles west of Warner, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Broadcast media. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Warner... Gore... Webbers Falls... Oktaha... Rentiesville... Greenleaf State Park... Lake Tenkiller State Park... Keefeton... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 266 and 293. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
